bibl.title: William W. Tinkham and Annie Ll. Tinkham v. David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell. Notice of Appeal
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Justice Court of Mount Vernon Precinct County of Skagit, Territory of Washington

body.p: In the Justice Court before John T. Mason, one of the Justices of the peace in and for Mount Vernon Precinct, County of Skagit, Territory of Washington.
Territory of Washigton, Plaintiff, No...... vs. David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell, Notice of Appeal. Defendants

To the above named defendants, David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell, the Territory of Washington and H.A. Fairchild, Prosecuting attorney for the Counties of Skagit and Whatcom; Washington Territory, and John T. Mason, the above named Justice of the Peace:

You and each of you will take notice hereby that the said William W. Tinkham the complaining witness in the above entitled cause, considers himself aggrieved by that certain judgement rendered in the above entitled Court by the said Justice of the Peace, on the 2nd day of September, 1887, wherein it was ordered, adjudged, and decreed that the said William W. Tinkham pay the costs of the above entitled action, taxed at $40.25, and that he has appealed and does hereby appeal from said Judgement and from every part thereof to the District Court of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding Terms at La Connen, in Skagit County, Washington Territory. Dated September ..... 1887
Burke + Haller Attorneys for William W. Tinkham
In Justice Court in Skagit Co. Wash. Tr.
Territory of Washington vs David E. Kimble
filed Sept 12, 1887 John T. Mason Justice of the Peace
BURKE & HALLER ATTORNEYS=AT=LAW SEATTLE, WASH. TER.
